# Or you can remove this header line to prevent this file from being overwritten

file(COPY  BUG_352a.cir BUG_352a.cir.sh BUG_352b.cir README exclude tags DESTINATION ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})
file(CHMOD ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/BUG_352a.cir.sh PERMISSIONS OWNER_READ OWNER_WRITE OWNER_EXECUTE GROUP_READ GROUP_EXECUTE WORLD_READ WORLD_EXECUTE)
if( (NOT Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI) AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_352/BUG_352a.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} BUG_352a.cir.sh ${XYCE_BINARY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} BUG_352a.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_352/BUG_352a.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_352/BUG_352a.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel")
endif()
if( Xyce_PARALLEL_MPI  AND PERL_FOUND )
  add_test(NAME ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_352/BUG_352a.cir.sh COMMAND perl -I${XyceRegressionTestScripts} BUG_352a.cir.sh "mpiexec -bind-to none -np 2 ${XYCE_BINARY}" ${XYCE_VERIFY} ${XYCE_VERIFY} BUG_352a.cir ${OutputDataDir}/Certification_Tests/BUG_352/BUG_352a.cir.prn )
  set_property(TEST ${TestNamePrefix}Certification_Tests/BUG_352/BUG_352a.cir.sh PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel")
endif()
